actions.text: Referred to the Committee on Finance.

official_title: A resolution expressing the sense of the Senate that the United States Trade Representative should bring a case before the World Trade Organization regarding the violations of intellectual property rights by the People's Republic of China.

summary.text: Expresses the sense of the Senate that the U.S. Trade Representative should immediately initiate a case (regarding violations of intellectual property rights) against the People's Republic of China through the World Trade Organization (WTO) dispute settlement process.

titles.title: A resolution expressing the sense of the Senate that the United States Trade Representative should bring a case before the World Trade Organization regarding the violations of intellectual property rights by the People's Republic of China.
